Room.Name: Milsene Museum's Caverns of Doom Exhibit
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the mysterious Caverns of Doom exhibit based on some under- ground caverns and passages underneath the mountains and the lakes.
Room.LongDescription: The caves are remarkablly well reproduced here, although on a much smaller scale than in real life. There are a number of small things moving on the dusty, damp floor, mostly consisting of venemous rats and other vermin. Every so often, you see some orcs or worms wandering around in the depths of the caves.
